ac08c5d5-4e79-40a1-9b71-54ea676a5dc0.name: SS-CSE Dolby Atmos® Enabled Speakers
about_us: Stunning cinematic surround sound with Dolby Atmos
Mica Reinforced Cellular cone for clear audio
Compact design to match the CS series

General Features.Frequency Response: 70 Hz – 32,000 Hz, Conforms to Dolby Atmos® Specification

Size & Weight.Dimensions (W x H x D): Approx. 7-1/8" × 5-3/4" × 7-1/8" (178 mm x 145 mm x 180 mm) (without speaker terminal/including grill)

Dolby Atmos\u00ae: Dolby Atmos®Dolby Atmos delivers breathtaking realism with 360° surround sound by accurately positioning sound within your environment. The result is rich audio that completely envelops you-and with the SS-CSE speakers, the sound even comes from above you.
Immersive surround sound: Immersive surround soundNo need for complicated speaker setups. The compact SS-CSE speakers work with your existing setup and living space to recreate a cinematic surround sound experience.
Set up on your existing speakers: Set up on your existing speakersThe compact SS-CSE speaker can sit on top of your existing speakers for an even more immersive surround experience. Unlike conventional speakers, they are designed specifically to reflect sound off your ceiling for sound that is truly all-encompassing.
Wall-mounted front high for a cinematic: Wall-mounted front high for a cinematic experienceUpgrade to a pro-theater setup by mounting the discreet SS-CSE speakers on your wall in different positions, such as front high above your TV. The result is more effective multi-dimensional, Dolby Atmos sound that's serious about home entertainment.
CS series design: CS series designThe SS-CSE speakers are designed to blend seamlessly with your décor, thin-screen TVs and AV receivers. Made with sophisticated woodworking techniques, the compact cabinet perfectly matches the existing CS series speakers in both sound and design.
Rich acoustics with a strong MDF cabinet: Rich acoustics with a strong MDF cabinetOptimized by our sound designers, an all-wood cabinet delivers resonant acoustics. Unwanted vibrations are dampened and absorbed, thanks to strengthened Medium Density Fiberboard interior joints. The result is clear, wide spatial reproduction of sound for TV and movies.
Crisp, clear audio with a Mica Reinforce: Crisp, clear audio with a Mica Reinforced Cellular (MRC) coneMany conventional speakers use paper cones that can flex and deteriorate over time, delivering a more distorted sound. The SS-CSE's MRC woofers are rigid, holding their shape even under high pressure. So you can turn up the volume on TV, movies and music without compromising your audio quality.
Compact and versatile: Compact and versatileThe SS-CSE's compact profile makes it ideal to discreetly install on your existing speakers and walls. Whether you're looking to upgrade to cinematic Dolby Atmos sound or simply extend your current surround experience, this versatile speaker will give you an all-encompassing aural upgrade.
